legacy.description: Global Watch takes you around the world at 0400 GMT everyday on CGTN @CGTNOfficial, bringing the latest top stories and getting to the heart of breaking news.

legacy.full_text: The Israeli military says it uncovered a Hamas tunnel shaft and weapons at #Gaza's Al Shifa hospital. Hamas denied Israel's claim. #Israel says its army withdrew from the hospital on Wednesday, 16 hours after storming it. But tanks and forces are still stationed in its vicinity. https://t.co/dlY8viqPhr

legacy.full_text: #Palestinian medics have expressed concern for the lives of hundreds of patients and medical staff at Al Shifa hospital, which has run out of fuel and been cut off for more than a day after #Israeli forces entered. https://t.co/1lotJUpx5N

legacy.full_text: Palestinian news agency Wafa says the Israeli military has taken 5,000 people inside the Al Shifa hospital as hostages. Israel has not yet commented on the situation.

legacy.full_text: Chinese President Xi Jinping has received a warm welcome from organizations in the United States, at a special dinner held Wednesday in San Francisco. legacy.full_text: A villager spotted a wild giant panda wandering near a house at night last week in Baoxing County, Sichuan Province. The village is at the entrance of the Giant Panda National Park. The bears are seen more frequently as their habitats expand. #ChinaBiodiversity #PlanetMatters https://t.co/lROoaeRgzR

legacy.full_text: #UK's Supreme Court has ruled that the government's scheme to send asylum seekers to Rwanda is unlawful. The ruling is a massive blow to UK PM Rishi Sunak, who made reducing the number of refugees and migrants one of his key performance metrics as leader. https://t.co/HHpsB2deKq
